item.description:
Hello! We are partnering this month with the MetroWest Meet Up out of Maynard and going back to Udupi, the all vegeterian(and mostly vegan) Indian restaurant in Shrewsbury.


If you have any questions you can reach me at 508-459-1074 or you can email me as well.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp March Meetup
